name: ui-engine
description: A SSG for prototyping the UI & generate asset bundles for production. Based on Vue, Nuxt and Webpack.
author: ronnidc & mortenhoffmanndoff

scripts.dev: node echo "The ui-engine with Vue templates, SCSS, ES6 & Hot Module Replacement is warming up.." --font-color 36 && nuxt
scripts.dev:ip: node echo "The ui-engine with Vue templates, SCSS, ES6 & Hot Module Replacement is warming up.." --font-color 36 && NUXT_HOST=0.0.0.0 NUXT_PORT=3333 nuxt
scripts.generate: node echo "Generating static prototypes.." --font-color 32 && nuxt generate
scripts.build-dev: node echo "Building dev bundles.." --font-color 32 && webpack --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.build-prod: node echo "Building production bundles.." --font-color 32 && webpack --config webpack.prod.js
scripts.build: node echo "No build mode specified! Please run build-prod or build-dev. Now running a production build as fallback:" --font-color 35 && npm run build-prod
scripts.clean: node echo "Deleting the /dist/ directory.." --font-color 32 && rimraf dist/
scripts.ssr-build: node echo "Building Server-Side Rendered build (Universal SSR).." --font-color 34 && nuxt build
scripts.ssr-start: node echo "Starting Server-Side Rendered preview (Universal SSR).." --font-color 34 && nuxt start
